meanings.definition: A person or thing that fabricates or manufactures something, especially using advanced technology.
meanings.sent1: The fabber in the factory creates new products every day.
meanings.sent2: The fabber used the 3D printer to make a prototype of the design.
meanings.sent3: The fabber accidentally made a toy that came to life!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a fabber of dreams, crafting each one with care.
meanings.sent5: The fabber hummed as it worked, bringing ideas to life before their eyes.

meanings.definition: To fabricate or manufacture something, especially using advanced technology.
meanings.sent1: He will fabber a new part for the machine tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: The company fabbers custom-made furniture for their clients.
meanings.sent3: She fabbered a story about a talking cat to entertain the children.
meanings.sent4: The artist fabbered a masterpiece from discarded materials.
meanings.sent5: The inventor fabbered a device that could change the world.
